links.*: Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem
Report on the Excavation of the Prehistoric, Roman, and Post-Roman Site in Lydney Park, Gloucestershire

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==February==
* '''[[21 February|21]]''' - Scholar [[John Ellison]] is born.
==April==
* '''[[8 April|8]]''' - [[C.S. Lewis]] recommends his brother [[Warren Lewis|Warren]] in a letter to read [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s translation of ''[[The Owl and the Nightingale]]''.
* '''[[27 April|27]]''' - Voice actor [[Casey Kasem]] is born.
==May==
* '''?''' - [[The British Esperantist, Vol.28, May 1932|''The British Esperantist'' (Vol.28)]], including [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s "[[A Philologist on Esperanto]]", is published.
* '''[[24 May|24]]''' - [[R.W. Chambers]] sends [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] an inscribed copy of ''[[Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem]]''.
* '''[[27 May|27]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to A.F. Colborn (27 May 1932)|a letter to A.F. Colborn]].
==June==
* '''[[12 June|12]]''' - Actor [[Michael Elsworth]] is born.
* '''[[22 June|22]]''' - Voice actress [[Prunella Scales]] is born.
==July==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s essay "[[The Name 'Nodens']]" is published as an appendix to the ''[[Report on the Excavation of the Prehistoric, Roman, and Post-Roman Site in Lydney Park, Gloucestershire]]''. 
==August==
* '''[[9 August|9]]''' - Voice actor [[Denys Hawthorne]] is born.
==October==
* '''[[19 October|19]]''' - Artist [[Fritz Möser]] is born.
==November==
* '''[[30 November|30]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
==December==
* '''[[9 December|9]]''' - Author [[Jan Broberg]], who were to conduct [[1961 Jan Broberg|an interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born.
* '''[[23 December|23]]''' - Father Christmas writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
* '''?''' - Tolkien's essay ''[[Sigelwara Land|Sigelwara Land (Part 1)]]'' is published.

{{Years|1929|1930|1931|1932|1933|1934|1935|}}
